description: EduLinker is an interactive web application for collaborative group study, where friends can create, submit, and grade assignments.
message: While working on this project, I faced challenges like optimizing responsiveness and ensuring smooth navigation. To enhance the user experience, I plan to add engaging animations and refine the overall design for a more modern and visually appealing interface.

description: FundSpring, a platform designed to bring together people who want to make a difference by supporting meaningful causes. Whether you're looking to contribute, raise funds, or volunteer, FundSpring is here to connect you with the right opportunities.
message: Faced challenges with responsiveness and navigation. Planning to add animations and refine the design for a better user experience.

description: The Winter Clothing Donation Website is a platform designed to connect donors with volunteers to help vulnerable communities across Bangladesh during the harsh winter season. It provides a simple and accessible way for users to contribute by donating winter clothes like jackets, blankets, and sweaters.
message: This project currently lacks a backend. I plan to integrate MongoDB to manage data efficiently and enhance functionality.
